title: My Google Pixel 2 is slow to respond unless on Power Saving mode, and System UI stops responding
content:
Device has enough Storage, has already booted it up in Safe mode, problem persists. And I ultimately Factory Reset my Pixel 2, and it's still have device performance issues.

Slow to respond on lock screen, and anywhere else with the device in general while NOT in Power Saving mode. In power saving mode the phone works perfectly. Please help.
